mapper.insert: insert into today_delivery (u_id, td_name, td_phone, td_volume, td_address, postcode, u_detail_address, kind_release, delivery_fee) values ('km1', #{td_name}, #{td_phone}, #{td_volume}, #{td_address}, #{postcode}, #{u_detail_address}, #{kind_release}, #{delivery_fee})
mapper.select: select * from today_delivery a join kind_release b on a.u_id=b.u_id and a.u_id='km1' and a.kind_release=b.kind
select sum(delivery_fee) as 'delivery_sum' from today_delivery a join kind_release b on a.u_id=b.u_id and a.u_id='km1' and a.kind_release=b.kind
select u_id,kind,container_type,container_num from kind_release where u_id = 'km1'
